title: Yeezy 500 'Stone Salt'
description: The adidas Yeezy 500 'Stone Salt' brings an airy grey mesh upper with contrast overlays made with a mix of sultry leather and cow suede. Reflective piping accents aid visibility in low-light conditions, while a padded collar and Ortholite insoles combine for a plush all-around feel. An abrasion-resistant rubber wrap pairs with an adiPRENE+ midsole that has pods on the outsole modeled after Feet You Wear technology.

title: Samba OG 'White Black Gum'
description: The adidas Samba OG is a modern version of a classic style. This 'Cloud White' version has a leather upper with suede on the contrast heel panel, the T-toe, and the iconic serrated three-stripes. Retro touches include bluebird and foil logos. Underfoot, the low top rests on a gum rubber outsole with a tread pattern ideal for multi-directional movement.

title: Wmns Dunk Low 'Khaki Team Red'

title: Air Diamond Turf 'Cowboy'
description:
SKU: FZ8224 101
Colorway: White/College Navy/White
Release Date: 12/5/25

title: Jordan 4 Retro 'Black Cat' 2025
description: The 2025 version of the Air Jordan 4 Retro 'Black Cat' brings back the classic foam midsole paired with a visible Nike Air heel unit. Loyal to the 2006 design, these kicks have a black nubuck upper tooled with a quarter panel netting, molded eyelets and anchor wings. A matching Jumpman lands on the tongue tag and heel tab.

title: Wmns Jordan 4 Retro 'Orchid'
description: The Women's Air Jordan 4 Retro 'Orchid' rolls out a lilac-colored suede upper with a visible side netting and grey molded eyelets. Speckled details adorn the support wings and molded back tab, adorned with the Jumpman logo, much like the foam midsole. Encapsulated Air-sole cushioning rests in the forefoot, while the heel equips an exposed Air bag for a soft feel underfoot.

title: Wmns Jordan 4 Retro 'Canyon Purple'
description: The Women's Air Jordan 4 Retro 'Canyon Purple' features both unique colors and materials on the classic silhouette. Eschewing traditional leather or nubuck seen on most AJ4s, the upper utilizes a shaggy suede in a vibrant purple hue. Lime green accents the eyelets and midsole, while the Jumpman logo on the tongue appears in Safety Orange. Black molded wings and back heel tab are contrasted in black, while the midsole appears in the classic white/black combination with an exposed Nike Air unit in the heel.

title: Yeezy Boost 350 V2 'Onyx'
description: A monochromatic 'Onyx' hue envelops the latest Yeezy Boost 350 V2, the lifestyle runner from adidas and Kanye West. The upper features a dark black Primeknit weave along with rope laces, while a post-dyed monofilament side stripe can be found in a lighter black shade. A full-length Boost unit is encapsulated in a semi-translucent ribbed TPU midsole, while a black rubber outsole rounds out the look.

title: Wmns Air Max 95 OG 'Blue Tint' 2025
description: The 2025 version of the Nike Women's Air Max 95 OG 'Blue Tint' has side panels made with rippling layers of synthetic suede done up in a grey gradient. Pastel blue touches decorated the webbed lace loops, as well as the logo on the Max Air unit bolstering the foam midsole.

title: Jordan 11 Retro 'Rare Air'
description: The Air Jordan 11 Retro 'Rare Air' is inspired by the imperfections found on early Air Jordan samples. These shoes have a white leather upper with a shiny blue patent leather mudguard. A red Jumpman logo adorns the side, while 'Jordan' is spelled out through each of the webbed eyelets, and a stylized '23' signoff lands on the back tab. The Phylon midsole works in tandem with a full-length Air-sole unit and a see-through rubber outsole.

title: SHAI 001 'Charm Black'
description:
SKU: A18977C

Release Date: 10/2/25

title: Stranger Things x Weapon 'Laser Blue'

title: Wmns VLTG Mid 'Space Cowgirl'

Colorway: Black/Pure Silver/White

title: Jordan 4 Retro OG GS 'White Cement' 2025
description: The Air Jordan 4 Retro OG GS 'White Cement' 2025 sports white leather on the upper and the unmistakable quarter panel netting to go with black molded eyelets. A red Jumpman logo lands on the Flight tongue tag, while the Nike Air logo adorns the grey speckled heel tab. That same finish can be seen on the wings and on part of the foam midsole, fitted with an Air-sole heel unit. The rubber outsole has a herringbone traction pattern for smooth grip.

title: Zoom Kobe 6 GS 'Dodgers'
description: The Nike Zoom Kobe 6 GS 'Dodgers' rocks a royal blue micromesh upper, using foam 'islands' that constitute an eye-catching snakeskin texture. Red baseball-style stitching on the tongue makes way for Kobe Bryant's 3D sheath logo, matching the white Swoosh on the side and the heel counter. A red '8' signs off on the heel as a nod to the Hall of Famer. These shoes have a full-length Cushlon midsole bolstered with a Zoom Air forefoot unit for a plush feel.

title: Ja 3 GS 'Light Show'
description:
SKU: IB4773 100

title: Jordan 12 Retro GS 'Taxi' 2025
description:

Colorway: White/Taxi/Black
Release Date: 11/8/25

title: Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Kids 'Bone'
description: The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Kids 'Bone' has an off-white Primeknit upper highlighted by distinctive center stitching and a post-dyed monofilament side stripe. No-tie elastic laces and a pull tab at the heel make on and off a breeze. The Yeezy logo adorns the insoles for a signature look. A full-length Boost midsole is engulfed in a plastic cage, all anchored by a rubber outsole.

title: Zoom Kobe 6 GS 'All-Star - Sail'
description: The Nike Zoom Kobe 6 GS 'Sail', also known as 'All-Star 2.0', rolls out an off-white micromesh upper, covered in embossed stars in place of the traditional snakeskin-like texture. A contrasting black Swoosh graces the side panel, matching Kobe Bryant's shield logo on the tongue. A see-through heel counter offers ankle stability, while the lightweight Cushlon midsole has a Zoom Turbo forefoot unit for on-court responsiveness.

title: Wmns P-6000 'Metallic Silver Black'
description:
SKU: BV1021 013
Colorway: Metallic Silver/Black/White/Metallic Silver
Release Date: 10/1/25

title: Yeezy Desert Boot 'Oil' 2024
description: The 2024 iteration of the adidas Yeezy Desert Boot 'Oil' shoes bring an earth-toned upper, featuring open-cell mesh with matching nubuck and suede overlays. A padded high-cut collar helps keep you comfortable the minute you lace them up, while a rubber mudguard protects high-abrasion areas. These kicks have a lightweight foam midsole, anchored by a durable rubber outsole.

title: BAPE x Samba 'Black White Gum'
description: The BAPE x adidas Samba 'Black White Gum' brings a black leather upper updated with a rubberized T-toe overlay. A white BAPESTA logo decorates the right side of each shoe, while the opposite side is stamped with classic white leather three-stripes. Both brand logos land on the tongue tag and insoles. A gum rubber sole unit completes the look.

title: Jordan 8 Retro 'Bugs Bunny' 2025
description: The 2025 iteration of the Air Jordan 8 'Bugs Bunny' keeps true to the 1993 design, starting with a two-tone midsole with encapsulated Nike Air cushioning in the forefoot and heel. The white leather upper is secured with a unique cross-strap design and touched with perforated details on the side panel. A grey synthetic suede overlay engulfs the collar and heel for a textured feel. A colorful chenille Jumpman tongue patch adds an eye-catching element, while white overlays get a grey, black and red brushstroke design on the heel area.

title: A Ma Maniére x Jordan 4 Retro 'Dark Mocha'
description: The 2025 iteration of the Air Jordan 8 'Bugs Bunny' keeps true to the 1993 design, starting with a two-tone midsole with encapsulated Nike Air cushioning in the forefoot and heel. The white leather upper is secured with a unique cross-strap design and touched with perforated details on the side panel. A grey synthetic suede overlay engulfs the collar and heel for a textured feel. A colorful chenille Jumpman tongue patch adds an eye-catching element, while white overlays get a grey, black and red brushstroke design on the heel area.

title: Jordan 3 Retro OG 'Black Cement' 2024
description: The 2024 version of the Air Jordan 3 Retro OG 'Black Cement' stays true to the 1988 original, rolling out a black tumbled leather upper with grey elephant print forefoot and heel overlays. An embroidered red Jumpman stars on the tongue, while a raised Nike Air logo adorns the heel. A white foam midsole equips Air-sole cushioning, adding a touch of black along the heel, anchored by a grey rubber outsole.

title: Jordan 4 Retro 'Cave Stone'
description: The Air Jordan 4 Retro 'Cave Stone' rolls out a smooth nubuck upper with black pops on the side panel netting, molded eyelets and collar lining. A Jumpman emblem lands on the Flight-branded tongue tag, while the Nike Air logo decorates the molded heel tab. A white-and-black foam midsole undergirds the classic design.

title: Undefeated x Jordan 4 Retro 2025
description: The Undefeated x Air Jordan 4 brings back the collab that initially dropped in 2005, limited to only 72 pairs. Inspired by the MA-1 flight jacket, these shoes sport a deep green nubuck upper with contrasting black pops on the molded eyelets, supports wings, and Nike Air back tab. Hook-and-loop logo patches decorate the tongue, lined with orange knit inside. An off-white foam midsole pairs with a visible orange Nike Air heel unit to round out the look.

title: Bad Bunny x Campus 'The Last Campus'
description: The Bad Bunny x adidas Campus 'The Last Campus' brings a brown hairy suede upper, accented with tan leather three-stripes, including a heavily-padded collar for a plush feel as soon as you lace them up. A doubled-up tongue is marked with Benito's eye logo to give these shoes a unique look. A cream-colored midsole is anchored by a herringbone-patterned rubber outsole.

title: Chuck 70 High 'Sketch - Black'
description:
SKU: A09139C
Colorway: Black/White/Red
Release Date: 7/1/24

title: Carhartt WIP x Chuck 70 Low 'Green Camo'
description: The Carhartt WIP x Chuck 70 Low 'Green Camo' released as part of a collaboration with the workwear brand. The shoe's upper is built with 12 oz organic canvas, finished entirely in a woodland camo print. A rubber toe cap adds durability, while the woven tongue tag includes a Carhartt logo. Underfoot, a vulcanized rubber midsole supports the fit.

title: Notre x Chuck 70 High 'Textile'
description: Echoing the materials and furnishings associated with high-end interior décor, the Notre x Converse Chuck 70 High ‘Textile’ features a canvas upper in grey with a patchwork collection of herringbone, houndstooth and flannel textiles throughout. A leather patch with All Star branding adorns the medial ankle and the pull loop at the heel in grosgrain makes for easy on-and-off. Notre and Converse branding share the signature license plates on the back heal against the rubber midsole in off-white.

title: Chuck 70 High 'Dark Beetroot'
description:
SKU: A01448C
Colorway: Dark Beetroot/Egret/Black

title: Wmns Jordan 4 Retro 'Frozen Moments'
description: The 'Frozen Moments' edition of the Women's Air Jordan 4 Retro showcases an upper made of pale grey suede, accompanied by a glossy leather overlay on the front of the shoe. The throat and quarter panel incorporate breathable netting, while a metallic silver coating adorns the molded eyelets and support wings. The tongue and molded heel tab display Jumpman branding in the same shade. The sneaker's midsole is crafted from grey foam and includes visible Air-sole cushioning in the heel for optimal support.

title: Wmns Jordan 11 Retro 'Neapolitan'
description: Inspired by the classic ice cream in its trio of flavors, the Women's Air Jordan 11 Retro 'Neapolitan' showcases a white leather upper highlighted by a glossy brown patent leather mudguard and white webbing eyelets. Below, a white Phylon midsole features a full-length Air-sole unit atop a translucent rubber outsole with a pinkish tint and grippy herringbone traction pods. A stylish '23' is imprinted on the heel tab while the lateral collar displays a stitched Jumpman logo.

title: Wmns Jordan 2 Retro 'Cool Grey'
description: The Women's Air Jordan 2 Retro 'Cool Grey' sneaker incorporates a classic color scheme with Michael Jordan's second signature shoe. The iconic silhouette features a nubuck upper in sleek grey intersected by a tonal suede overlay at the midfoot trimmed in piping in an Ice Blue hue. This vivid shade also dresses the laces, heel tab, and the embossed Wings logo on the tongue. The crisp white PU midsole offers optimal cushioning, while a two-tone rubber outsole provides support and stability underfoot.

title: Air Force 1 Low 'Pink Cooler Patent'

SKU: IO4489 600
Colorway: Pink Cooler/Mulberry Rose
Release Date: 12/5/25

title: LAAMS x Air Force 1 'Please Post Bills'
description:
SKU: IM6604 323
Release Date: 12/16/25

title: Zoom Kobe 4 Protro 'Girl Dad'
description: The Nike Zoom Kobe 4 Protro ‘Girl Dad’ nods to the bond Kobe Bryant shared with his daughters. The muted teal suede upper has rolled edges and contrast black accents on the Swoosh, collar lining and inside the tongue. A chrome-plated heel counter reveals Kobe Bryant’s signature on the lateral side, while the inner tongue displays a ‘Girl Dad’ signoff. These sneakers have a lightweight Phylon midsole equipped with a responsive Zoom Air heel unit. A herringbone-pattern rubber outsole meets a carbon fiber shank plate to provide midfoot support and grippy traction underfoot.

title: Dunk Low 'Black White'
description: The Dunk Low 'Black White' also known as 'Panda' brings a classic two-tone look to its classic basketball construction. The shoe's low-top build emerges in leather, with a white base contrasted by black overlays, with further black on the Swoosh branding. Perforations on the toe box provide breathability, while underfoot, the two-tone look is matched by the tooling, which incorporates a concentric rubber outsole for traction.

title: Wmns Jordan 3 Retro 'Rust Pink'
description:
SKU: CK9246 600
Colorway: Sail/Rust Pink/White/Crimson/nRelease Date: 5/28/21

title: Wmns Dunk High 'Black White'
description: The Wmns Dunk High 'Black White' brings a classic two-tone look to a classic high-top silhouette. Built with leather, the shoe's upper appears in a mix of black and white, contrasted only by the red on the woven tongue tag. The toe box is perforated to offer breathability, while the rubber cupsole anchors the build and maintains the black and white look. A concentric rubber outsole is included for traction.

title: Wmns TC 7900 'Pale Ivory Armory Navy'
description:
SKU: DD9682 103
Colorway: Pale Ivory/Gum Light Brown/Armory Navy
Release Date: 6/19/24

title: Wmns Chuck Taylor All Star Lift Low 'Bow'
description: The Converse Women's Chuck Taylor All Star Lift Low 'Bow' brings a beige canvas upper wrapped in embroidered florals and topped with a knotted bow on the heel. Metal eyelets, a sturdy rubber toe cap, and winged stitching on the tongue are some of the iconic details still present. These shoes have a platform foam midsole, stamped with the All Star license plate and anchored by a brown rubber outsole.
